title: An Act relative to streamlining licensure, compliance, and contracting opportunities

abstracts.abstract: By Representative LeBoeuf of Worcester, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 421) of David Henry Argosky LeBoeuf relative to streamlining licensure, compliance, and contracting opportunities.  Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure

related_entities.name: committee on Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 04/29/2025 from 10:00 AM-01:00 PM in A-1
Hearing rescheduled to 04/29/2025 from 10:00 AM-05:00 PM in B-1
Bill reported favorably by committee as changed and referred to the committee on House Ways and Means

related_entities.name: the committee on House Ways and Means
committee on House Ways and Means
